turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can I get a Can I get a Starbucks espresso for pick up at Washington Avenue in North Haven, Connecticut?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The iced black, and white mocha with a pump of caramel, and skimmed milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: could you repeat that order please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti iced black and white mocha espresso with skim milk and two pumps of caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a venti iced black and white mocha with skim milk and 2 pumps of caramel from starbucks on washington avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got that right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, the total for the order is $3.40.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, place the order now, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. the drink will be ready in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, this is perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy.
